document_data.mainbody: Astronomy''' was the field of observing the movements of [[:Category:Stars|stars]] and [[constellation]]s in [[Realmspace]].
document_data.Education:
The [[University]] of [[Cimbar]] in Chessenta taught astronomy in one of its colleges in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].

In any decent-sized city, a sage specialized in astronomy could be found with a 10% chance, or 20% in [[Amn]], around [[1358 DR]].
